house_listing.house_description: This single family home built in 1992 has 4 bedroom(s), 3 bath(s) , 2 car garage. Rooms include dining room, family room, master bedroom. Features include view, private pool, private spa, patio, fireplace.

residential_listing_-_feature_details.rooms: Dining Room, Family Room, Master Bedroom

house_listing.residential_listing_-_additional_feature: Breakfast Bar, Cathedral/Vaulted Ceilings, Ceiling Fan(s), Dishwasher,Eat In Kitchen, Garage Door Opener, Gazebo, Kitchen Island, Loft,Microwave
